channel.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Echo_, post:24, topic:395040”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=492231.msg3599486#msg3599486 date=1305424166]
I’m not trying to advertise here but I currently have bought 2 dung bots, one from rsbots ($30) and one kiko’s from powerbot ($10). I should’ve gone with the $10 one all along. It is amazing. So many people have gotten 80+ from it. Only takes a week.
[/quote]

And considering how many people have cracked it by now, you could have kept your 10 dollars[/quote]
Well I would rather pay 10$ (which is like nothing lol) then have a site get mad at me for abusing and stealing their product and abduct my account or send me a virus.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Echo_, post:26, topic:395040”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=492231.msg3600571#msg3600571 date=1305510769]

I’m not trying to advertise here but I currently have bought 2 dung bots, one from rsbots ($30) and one kiko’s from powerbot ($10). I should’ve gone with the $10 one all along. It is amazing. So many people have gotten 80+ from it. Only takes a week.

And considering how many people have cracked it by now, you could have kept your 10 dollars

I tried one of those cracked ones, they dont seem to work, plus i dont want to take a bigger chance at getting keylogged or something :o.
[/quote]

You could have cracked it yourself

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Although I didn’t crack mine, a friend of mine already did it so I use his server for the fake authentication.[/quote]
hm… oh well, already paid for it, so i guess i cant do anything about it :).

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:12, topic:395040”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=492231.msg3599481#msg3599481 date=1305424018]

This was posted directly from runescape forums. Someone posted it on rsbots.

What makes me really mad is half of the kids there probably bot. Luckily the only thing I’m botting on my accounts is dung.

I haven’t really thought of that, they can’t just go into your dung game. Time to start coding some new dung bots. xD
[/quote]

I’m not trying to advertise here but I currently have bought 2 dung bots, one from rsbots ($30) and one kiko’s from powerbot ($10). I should’ve gone with the $10 one all along. It is amazing. So many people have gotten 80+ from it. Only takes a week.[/quote]
Yeah, i bought the $10 one, its amazing, and yeah gl taking down dung bots jagex.

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:19, topic:395040”]Its been said before, only a small portion of bots that are unearthed are banned, just to make it look like jagex is doing something about the bots, when in essence they dont do much because the botted accounts are also paying for members, given the immense about of bots, the money they get just from botting members alone is a nice portion of their income.

tbh this is just another attempt to make players believe they are trying to remove bots[/quote]
I agree half way, Jagex doesn’t really want to ban paying bots so it will mainly be a sweep of the ftp worlds. What I think they are doing is trying to keep the fear of being banned alive so it doesn’t all turn to hell.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Its been said before, only a small portion of bots that are unearthed are banned, just to make it look like jagex is doing something about the bots, when in essence they dont do much because the botted accounts are also paying for members, given the immense about of bots, the money they get just from botting members alone is a nice portion of their income.

tbh this is just another attempt to make players believe they are trying to remove bots

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:14, topic:395040”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=492231.msg3599487#msg3599487 date=1305424245]

This was posted directly from runescape forums. Someone posted it on rsbots.

What makes me really mad is half of the kids there probably bot. Luckily the only thing I’m botting on my accounts is dung.

I haven’t really thought of that, they can’t just go into your dung game. Time to start coding some new dung bots. xD

I’m not trying to advertise here but I currently have bought 2 dung bots, one from rsbots ($30) and one kiko’s from powerbot ($10). I should’ve gone with the $10 one all along. It is amazing. So many people have gotten 80+ from it. Only takes a week.

Im just going to go with one from rsbuddy cause its just easier to me.
[/quote]

If you prefer them then go for it. Does he sell the script for them too?[/quote]
Yep, they have a few premium ones for basically everything in rs and a lot of free ones that work really well.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex's new taking down bot stradegies
